entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Murdochville
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning early in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late in the evening then clearing. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 late in the evening then diminishing to 20 overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
